name: the Sequence (itch)
description:
[the Sequence] is a logic construction puzzler.Let your mind be your guide: Lay down seven different kinds of modules as your roadblocks to get you (portrayed as a binary data point) to a sweet destination. Apply an out-of-the-box thinking to get you to the next level! Every module is customizable in various ways; be free to create mind-blowing sequences that no one else could build.

[the Sequence] features- Variety of different levels to beat
- Several kinds of modules
- Sandbox mode
- Stylish minimalistic graphics
- Futuristic sound
- Smooth ambient music
- Provides a great challenging experience for players.
